"The heart-breaking thing with respect to Guantanamo is not that there's anything wrong with it, it's one of the finest prison systems in the world," said Donald Rumsfeld . What's awkward is the fact that, for whatever reason, the administration was incapable of persuading people that that was a first-class operation, that they were not torturing people, that they were not hurting people, he said. the past. Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. "You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world. "Every president has a challenge when it goes from campaigning to governing, takes a while to figure out the difference between campaigning and governing," Colin Powell said on CNN's "State of the Union." Now we see at the end of the second year, he is definitely focusing on governing... we'll see how 2011 goes. Colin Powell , who worked in four presidential administrations- most recently under former President Bush - said he expects a strong economic message at the State of the Union address Tuesday. He said the electorate was expecting that focus

voor knippen-en-plakken. Later dit jaar volgt dan een grotere update. "Volledige web op de telefoon" Onderdeel in die grote update is een mobiele versie van IE9 met hardware-acceleratie voor Windows Phone. Dit is een goed voorbeeld van het samenbrengen van onderdelen binnen Microsoft om de gebruikservaring van Windows Phone te verbeteren , aldus Steve Ballmer . "We moeten het volledige web naar de telefoon brengen." De reguliere versie van IE9, waarvan recent de release candidate verscheen, gebruikt ook hardware-acceleratie voor het sneller verwerken van zware
